item.title: About
item.description: Hi ! I’m Abhishek Chauhan. I graduated from IIT Kharagpur in 2019 with a major in Ocean Engineering and Naval Architecture. In college, I realized that I am more interested in building softwares than ships! Ever since, I’ve been teaching myself to write code and build useful softwares. I am currently working as a Software Engineer at Google in Bengaluru, India.
